metadata.title: USN-4653-1 -- containerd vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that access controls for the shimâ€™s API socket did not restrict access to the abstract unix domain socket in some cases. An attacker could use this vulnerability to run containers with elevated privileges.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4653-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  containerd - 1.3.3-0ubuntu1~18.04.3 golang-github-docker-containerd-dev - 1.3.3-0ubuntu1~18.04.3 No subscription required
